resources.string: A C++ translator library for more than 200 raster and vector geospatial data formats.
An open source software for spatial data infrastructures and the geospatial web.
A library providing visualization and processing of geospatial data and web services.
A free and open source complete Geographic Information System (GIS) software suite.
Extends the PostGIS/PostgreSQL geospatial database providing routing functionality.
The leading Free and Open Source Geospatial Information System (GIS) for desktops.
An OSGeo incubated OGC Sensor Observation Service server implemented in Python.
OpenLayers implementation makes it easy to put a dynamic map in any web page.
A self-contained bootable DVD, USB thumb drive or Virtual Machine based on Lubuntu.
